title: Sources: Purdy, 49ers reach 5-year, $265M deal
description: Brock Purdy, the last pick in the 2022 NFL draft who has gone on to become a Pro Bowler, is finalizing a 5-year, $265M deal with the 49ers, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.
author: Nick Wagoner

title: Sources: Nuggets' Gordon in doubt for Game 7
description: Nuggets forward Aaron Gordon is in doubt for Sunday's Game 7 after being diagnosed with a strained left hamstring, sources told ESPN.
author: Shams Charania and Tim MacMahon

title: Vegas leads from Fitzpatrick as McIlroy makes US PGA cut
description: Jhonattan Vegas leads by two shots at the halfway mark of the US PGA Championship, although some top names are in the chasing pack at Quail Hollow.

title: Record lows for Man Utd & Spurs - but who's in best shape for Bilbao?
description: All eyes will be on Bilbao now as Manchester United and Tottenham switch focus from their disappointing domestic campaigns and try to win the Europa League.

title: Report: McIlroy's driver deemed nonconforming ahead of PGA Championship
description: Rory McIlroy was forced to use a backup driver in the PGA Championship when his regular driver was tested and deemed to be nonconforming after he arrived at Quail Hollow, according to a report on XM Sirius PGA Tour Radio. For the second straight day, McIlroy left Quail Hollow and declined to speak to the media. The USGA, which tests clubs to make sure they are conforming at the request of the tournaments in the U.S. and Mexico, confirmed the USGA did testing at Quail Hollow when asked by the PGA of America.
author: DOUG FERGUSON

title: Pete Crow-Armstrong’s big day helps make Cade Horton a winner in his 1st MLB — and City Series — start
description: CHICAGO — Chicago Cubs center fielder Pete Crow-Armstrong has played enough games at Wrigley Field in his young big league career to know the wind can create tricky elements in any game. At first pitch for Friday’s City Series opener against the White Sox, a 21-mph wind blowing out to left-center — with even stronger gusts — had the flags on the old scoreboard whipping. The wind can be a ...

title: Salah on Slot, stats, his new contract and the Ballon d'Or
description: Mo Salah sat down with Gary Neville to reflect on Liverpool's Premier League title win, how Arne Slot helped him post record-breaking individual numbers, whether that could win him the Ballon d'Or and why he thought his chance of signing a new contract was just 10 per cent....

title: Piastri pips Norris, Verstappen frustrated in closely-fought first Imola practice
description: ​​​​​​World championship leader Oscar Piastri narrowly set the pace from McLaren team-mate Lando Norris in a competitive Practice One session as the grid's big teams all revealed upgrades to their cars at the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix.
